data.name: 魔界堕ちのラズリエル -Lazriel the Demon's Fall-
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT

"Lazriel the Demon's Fall" is a roguelike game where you go up a tower in the demon world.
The angel "Lazriel", who has been dropped into the demon world, goes up the tower in order to return to the heavenly world.
The tower is infested with many demons, and Lazriel is consumed by their power.
Go up the tower before she "fall" to the demon's power, and aim to return alive.

STORY

The heavenly world is ruled by the goddess "Emelia". "Lazriel" is an honor student at a school in the heavens.
One day, Lazriel is invited to a ceremony at the school and is given a bow by Emelia as a sign of excellence.
However, on her way back from the ceremony, she faints and finds herself in the demon world!
The only way to return to the heavens is through a tower full of demons.
Will Lazriel be able to go up the tower and return to the heavenly world?

GAME

  • The game proceeds on a turn-based system where you and your enemy take turns.
  • Lazriel can use "Energy" to attack with arrows.
  • There are two types of Energy: Angel Energy and Demon Energy.
  • When using demon energy, Lazriel's body accumulates demonic power.

data.short_description: The angel "Lazriel" was dropped into the demon world. The only way to return to the heavenly world is to go up the tower. Go up the tower before she "fall" to the demon's power, and aim to return alive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
